alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; San Joaquin River Canyon; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 08 at 3:23AM PST until December 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow with total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 feet expected. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Nevada above 3,500 feet from San Joaquin River Canyon southward to South End of the Upper Sierra in Tulare County. In addition, snow levels are expected to rise to around 6,000 feet on Saturday evening into Sunday morning before lowering back to around 3,500 feet by Sunday evening. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
